markdownRemark.html:
“… the sentient beings who die as humans and are reborn as humans are few, while those who die as humans and are reborn in hell are many …”

SN.56.103. Manussacutitiracchānasutta (“Passing Away as Humans and Reborn as Animals”)

prev.excerpt: “… the sentient beings who die as humans and are reborn as humans are few, while those who die as humans and are reborn in the ghost realm…
